translations: 制造者；造物主；出期票人；创客

phrs.translation: n. 电影导演；电影制作人
准备买卖未上市股票的经纪人；[经]从事欧洲债券二级市场交易的银行
制冰机，制冰器；制冰装置

sentences.sentence: Mary is the decision-maker in the house.
If it doesn't work, send it back to the maker.
sentences.translation: 如果不管用，就把它退还给制造厂家。

sentences.sentence: The letter had come from an unknown mischief-maker.
sentences.translation: 这封信来自一个匿名的离间者。
